front.title: Data Transfer Protocol for Distributed Information Acquisition (DTP/DIA)

abstract.t: The described in this memo protocol was developed for the applicationin distributed information measurement systems (IMS) at any stage ofcommunication. It was designed for transmission of measured datafrom measuring devices to processing and storing equipment. Also itdoes support common device identification in distributed IMS. Due toits simplicity it can be easily implemented in firmware of anydigital measuring device.
